name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with over 13 years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in compliance-driven industries such as healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React**, with extensive hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development, utilizing **Node.js** and **FastAPI**. Skilled in designing **microservices** architectures and implementing robust **CI/CD** pipelines using tools like **GitHub**, **GitHub Actions**, **Jenkins**, and **SonarQube**.

Experience deploying applications on **cloud** platforms, particularly **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring scalability and reliability. Committed to delivering clean, maintainable code by adhering to best practices in **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies, along with a strong understanding of **Design Patterns** and **Unit Testing** methodologies. Recognized for expertise in creating AI/ML-powered platforms and MLOps, enhancing application capabilities with predictive analytics and automation.
